i read sci fi space adventures with a passion.
i like wide , open spaces.

My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours.

content.text: Hey there! What's your favorite Disney movie?
Hello! I think my favorite Disney movie is Mulan. It's so inspiring!
I love Mulan! It's so good! Have you seen it recently?
I saw it a few weeks ago! It was so good to see it again.
I love watching it when I'm feeling down. It always cheers me up.
Me too! It's such a feel-good movie.
What's your favorite part of the movie?
I think my favorite part is when she defeats Shan Yu. It's so empowering!
That's my favorite part too! It's so cool to see a woman defeat a man.
I know right! It's so refreshing to see a woman be strong and independent.
What do you think of the live-action version of Mulan?
I haven't seen it yet, but I'm excited to see it!
Me too! I've heard good things about it.
I hope it's as good as the animated version!
Me too! We'll have to watch it together and see what we think.
